Text:
Why the hell are here no comments? 27 seeders and no comment?
There is one more torrent very similar to this only that it is of 8.42GB but people have left comments there. So which one should I download?
Should I download this one or this one - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6104096/The.Good.The.Bad.And.The.Ugly.1966.EXTENDED.720p.BluRay.x264-HQF    ?
Handbrake didn't recognise this version. I've stuck to the other file.

If Handbrake doesn't recognize a file (it's very rare but it happens), try re-muxing it using MKV Merge or Yamb.  That almost always does the trick and only takes a few minutes.  If that doesn't work, trying doing the same with but with just the video track.  One of the two will work 99% of the time if you were able to play the original file and it wasn't corrupt.  If the second option only works, after you encode it to a smaller file with Handbrake you can mux the new video file together with the audio track from the original source file using one of the aforementioned tools.
